description: Lists current S3 Batch Operations jobs as well as the jobs that have ended within the last 90 days for the Amazon Web Services account making the request. For more information, see S3 Batch Operations in the Amazon S3 User Guide. To use the ListJobs operation, you must have permission to perform the s3:ListJobs action. Related actions include:

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the S3 Batch Operations job.

parameters.name: JobStatuses
parameters.description: The List Jobs request returns jobs that match the statuses listed in this element. (string) ---

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the List Jobs request produced more than the maximum number of results, you can pass this value into a subsequent List Jobs request in order to retrieve the next page of results.

nested_items.name: Jobs
nested_items.description: The list of current jobs and jobs that have ended within the last 30 days.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The ID for the specified job.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The user-specified description that was included in the specified job's Create Job request.

nested_items.name: Operation
nested_items.description: The operation that the specified job is configured to run on every object listed in the manifest.

nested_items.name: Priority
nested_items.description: The current priority for the specified job.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating when the specified job was created.

nested_items.name: TerminationDate
nested_items.description: A timestamp indicating when the specified job terminated. A job's termination date is the date and time when it succeeded, failed, or was canceled.

nested_items.name: ProgressSummary
nested_items.description: Describes the total number of tasks that the specified job has run, the number of tasks that succeeded, and the number of tasks that failed.

nested_items.name: ElapsedTimeInActiveSeconds
nested_items.description: Indicates the elapsed time in seconds the job has been in the Active job state.
